To discard: Destroy a card in hand that costs 2$ or more.
Effect: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
Flavour: "Every breath is torment." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
Flavour: "Best to kill these first." - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

Effect: The player with the most prepped spells suffers 2 damage for each of their prepped spells.
Flavour: "There are no words to describe the sound of a breach opening. Only the screams echoing off the cave walls after." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Effect: Unleash twice.
Flavour: "We toy with forces we barely comprehend." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Effect: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life. Then, this minion suffers 1 damage.
Flavour: The fumes they belch are so caustic that they rarely live long themselves.

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and draws a card.
Flavour: "It takes years to train a breach mage properly, but only a second to snuff one out." - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
Flavour: "We have nothing left to lose but our lives." - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: Nym looked up in awe as Malastar pointed to the roiling air at the dome of the cave. "Those, boy, are stars."

Effect: Unleash twice and Gravehold suffers 3 damage.#OR#Place the most recently discarded minion card in the nemesis discard pile back into play.
Flavour: "They were always just outside the edge of our knowing, sitting there in some quiet abyss just waiting to visit ruin upon us." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Special: When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Effect: Any player suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
Flavour: "Hack away all you like, youngling. It will only grow back another... whatever that part is." - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

Effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells discards their most expensive prepped spell.
Flavour: "The words and gestures needed left him, and the breach grew dim." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "The teeth of this beast make a fine trophy. The trick is keeping all your fingers in the taking of them." - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

Effect: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: Gravehold sat silent and forgotten for a thousand ages before The Nameless came. No one remembers for whom this vast city was built. Those stories lay in the ash outside the cave with the bones of those who once told them.

Effect: Gravehold suffers 18 damage. The players may collectively discard up to six gems. For each gem discarded this way, prevent 3 of that damage.
Flavour: "The ground absorbed the latent energy left by the first breaches ever opened. Without this to fuel our spells, our fate would be certain." - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

Effect: The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.#OR#Any player discards a prepped spell that costs 3$ or more.
Flavour: "In The World That Was, there were many creatures that used poison as a means of survival. But these things ARE poison." - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

Effect: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage and loses all of their charges.
Flavour: "There is a saying: all wars must end." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck, shuffles it, and then destroys the top four cards of their deck. Then, Unleash twice.
Flavour: "The Nameless do not die, for they themselves are death." - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

Effect: Unleash twice.
Flavour: Jagged ones are the heralds of The Nameless, leading legions in siege after siege of Gravehold.

Effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most opened breaches destroys four cards in hand or suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "While the breaches amplify our magic a thousandfold, it comes at the highest ransom imaginable." - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

To discard: Destroy two prepped spells that each cost 3$ or more.
Effect: Unleash three times.
Flavour: "The world shattered in a blink, and in the ruin I glimpsed the other side of the void." - Phaedraxa, Breach Mage Seer

Effect: Gravehold suffers 4 damage and the player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.#OR#Shuffle all of the nemesis turn order cards into the turn order deck.
Flavour: "We fight for the lingering hope of returning to The World That Was, but in our hearts we know our future lies within these caves." - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

Effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "LOOK OU--", Last words of Quilion Rafe, Far Hollow watchman

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and may place a card in their discard pile into their hand.
Flavour: "Such wisdom comes at a considerable price." - Xaxos, Voidbringer

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
Flavour: "Kadir remains convinced the drones were once merely creatures from The Depths."

Effect: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card was revealed, that player suffers 2 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
Unleash twice.#OR#Any player suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "Beyond our world is a vast nothing. At the center of this lies The Nameless." - Mist, Voidwalker

Effect: Any player suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "The sound they make as they weave echoes through the cave is like the otherworldly throes of our lost companions." - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

Effect: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
Flavour: "Here beneath The World That Was there is no day, no time really, just night unending." - Xaxos, Voidbringer

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
Flavour: "It's as if the world itself is screaming." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Unleash twice.
Flavour: "None remembered the true name of The World That Was until Yan Magda spoke it aloud: Khasad Vol."

Effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
Flavour: "The creature thrashed as it burned, its massive body collapsing into the South Wall like a hot blade through cloth." - Garu, Oathsworn Keeper

Effect: Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 3 damage and loses all of their charges.
Flavour: "The harsh light of the dead star burned away the dark as it crept through the breach. Amd around it I saw ravaged worlds The Nameless had already claimed." - Indira, Breach Apprentice

Effect: Unleash twice. Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck and shuffles it. Then, that player reveals the top two cards of their deck and destroys the most expensive card revealed.
The player with the most opened breaches suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "It sneered as it lunged at us, an awful maw of jagged teeth eager to end one of us, if not all." - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

Effect: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minion suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "One of the few indigenous creatures of the cave, though corrupted from exposure to the breach." - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

Effect: Unleash twice. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.
Flavour: "It churned and roiled, a maelstrom of malign power. The void was upon me and yet I felt only the throes of freedom from my prison of sleep." - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

Effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Any player suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "They say that before The Nameless found Gravehold, nothing grew in these caves. It appears the cave burgeons through our blood." - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

Effect: Unleash.
Flavour: "Quilius's first blow glanced off its carapace like breach, but her second blow carved it in twain." - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

Effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "One side of this struggle must fall for the other to truly live." - Xaxos, Voidbringer

Effect: Gravehold suffers 5 damage for each nemesis turn order card in the turn order discard pile.
Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage for each for their prepped spells.
Flavour: "Get down! It's ejecting back at us!" - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

To discard: Destroy a prepped spell that costs 5$ or more and a breach in which it was prepped.
Effect: The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

Special: When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Effect: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
Flavour: "Never have I seen such a creature, even among the ranks of The Nameless." - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

Effect: Resolve the most recently discarded attack card in the nemesis discard pile.
Flavour: "The Nameless rarely attack in the same fashion twice. It would seem today is an exception." - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

Effect: Gravehold suffers 7 damage.#OR#Unleash three times.
Flavour: "The Nameless hunger for the same thing we do: an end to this war." - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

Effect: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their three most expensive cards in hand.
Flavour: "Were I made of muscle and blood like the others, the impact would have surely ended me." - Remnant, Aetherial Entity

Effect: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
Flavour: "I watched a fellow merchant atrophy and fall to the ground in ash as the beam hit his cart." - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

Effect: Any player discards a prepped spell.#OR#Any player loses 1 charge.
Flavour: "It is the very breath of the void." - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

Effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive prepped spell places that spell on top of their deck.
Flavour: "For as massive as they are, they are quick." - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

Effect: The player with the most life suffers damage equal to their current life.
Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 2 damage and gains a charge.
Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
Any player suffers 2 damage and discards a card in hand. If that card costs 0$, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash. Any player discards two gems. If both of those gems cost 0$, Unleash.
Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage.
Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
Unleash twice. Any player loses 2 charges.#OR#Unleash twice. Any player suffers 3 damage.
Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Then, if any player has a prepped spell that costs 4$ or more, Unleash.
Any player suffers 2 damage.
Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 1 damage.
Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.
Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive card in hand discards two cards in hand. Then, for each card in that player's hand that costs 2$ or more, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of shield tokens this minion has. If this minion has two or less shield tokens, it gains one shield token.
Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys it. If that spell costs 4$ or less, or no spell was destroyed, Unleash.
Unleash twice. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, any player suffers 4 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Unleash twice.
Unleash twice. Any player destroys their most expensive card in hand.
Unleash three times.#OR#Gravehold suffers 3 damage and any player suffers 3 damage.
Gravehold suffers 3 damage. The player with the fewest opened breaches suffers 2 damage.
Place this card next to the player with the most life. For the rest of the game, when that player suffers damage, they suffer 1 additional damage.#(This cannot be removed once resolved.)
If there are two or more other minions in play, Gravehold suffers 6 damage and discard this minion. Otherwise, any player suffers 2 damage.
The player with the most expensive prepped spell casts that spell. The damage that spell deals must be dealt to the player who cast it instead of to a minion or the nemesis.
Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive card in hand destroys that card and then gains a card of the same type that costs less from any supply pile. That player suffers 2 damage.
Any player suffers 1 damage for each shield token this minion has. Then, this minion suffers 1 damage.
Unleash twice. Each minion in play gains 5 life.
If each player has at least one closed breach, the nemesis overwhelms them and the players lose.

Special: This minion can only be dealt damage by spells from a III breach.
Effect: Unleash twice.
Unleash three times.#OR#Gravehold suffers 6 damage.#OR#Any player suffers 5 damage.
Unleash three times.

Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage and destroys their most expensive card in hand.
Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive card in hand discards three cards in hand. Then, for each card in that player's hand that costs 2$ or more, that player suffers 2 damage.
Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage. Any player destroys the top four cards of their deck.

Unleash twice. Any player or Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

Flavour: "Don't forget, they use the same power our mages do, and they've got ages of experience on us." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Special: When a power token is removed from this, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Effect: Unleash.
Flavour: "Cut it off early. If our water's poisoned, we'll die in days instead of seconds." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Special: Reduce by 1 all damage dealt to minions from the nemesis deck, to a minimum of 1.
Effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
Flavour: "If you don't like choking while you cast, then stay away." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Special: Reduce to 1 all damage dealth to this by spells that cost 3$ or less.
Effect: Any player suffers 3 damage.#OR#Unleash.
Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage and discards two cards in hand. That player gains a Cursed Manacles from the Curse deck and places it into their hand.
Flavour: "It only held me for a moment. I think it was meant for a mage. They'd probably get hit far harder." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Effect: Unleash twice. Place this card in front of any player.#For the rest of the game, when a nemesis card specifies 'any player', the player with this card must resolve that effect, if possible. When the player with this card becomes exhausted, discard this.

Special: Reduce to 1 all damage dealt to this minion by spells that cost 5$ or more.
Effect: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

When that player gains a card that costs 5$ or more, this card is discarded. If there are no cards in the supply that cost 5$ or more, discard this when they gain a card with the highest cost in the supply.
Unleash.

Special: When a power token is removed from this, any player suffers 2 damage.
Effect: Unleash.
Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Any player gains a Cursed Shard from the Curse deck. Any player gains a Cursed Bolt from the Curse deck.
Flavour: "Just standing there exhausted me. I didn't stick around to find out what else could happen." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player gains a Cursed Bolt from the Curse deck.
Flavour: "It's not just the wind. The stuff it's blowing, that's not sand and stone." - Ruya, Surface Scout

Effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage, gains a Cursed Shard from the Curse deck, and places it on top of their deck.
Any player suffers 3 damage and gains a Curse of Rot from the Curse deck.
The players collectively discard four cards.
Flavour: "Fear is a luxury no longer granted to the living." - Brama, Breach Mage Mentor

Effect: Unleash twice. The player with the fewest opened breaches suffers 3 damage.
Flavour: "In an instant, the breach went dark. The mage then collapsed, gasping as the creatures fell upon him." - Nerva, Survivor

Effect: Unleash three times.#OR#Gravehold suffers 7 damage.
Flavour: "We are lost." - Ghan, Gem Scavenger

Effect: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, Gravehold suffers 2 additional damage.#(The nemesis tier is equal to the tier of the last nemesis card drawn.)
Unleash twice and any player gains 2 charges.#OR#Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
Flavour: "The days seem shorter as we approach a war eternal." - Nerva, Survivor

To discard: Discard a card in hand that costs 5$ or more.
Effect: Unleash twice. Any player discards a spell in hand.

To discard: Discard two cards in hand that each cost 4$ or more.
Effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
Flavour: "The myriad faces of The Thrice-Dead Prophet seemed to stare at us at once, the way one does at insects clambering upon a wall." - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

Effect: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their most expensive card in hand.#OR#Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.
Unleash twice. Any player destroys the top three cards of their deck and suffers 3 damage.
Flavour: "The Wraithmonger flailed, its ephemereal tentacle passing through a guard on the South Wall. And like that, he was gone. Not only from this world, but all worlds." - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

Flavour: Starts the game in the Curse deck.
